title: How can i change the Microphone?
content: I have multiple Microphones on my PC. I don't want to Plug them in and out Everytime, and some can't be unpluggt. Also i want the freedom to choose easily. I would love to change it in the "Permission for web.whatsapp.com" Menue thats drops down when i klick on it in the Adressbar. See picture attached.

title: update Firefox
content:
Dear Firefox Officer,

I have been requested by e-mail to update my Firefox 78.15.Oesr (64 bits) before the end of March. Is this update compatible with my MacBookPro5,4 with IOS El Capitan 10.11.6? Please note that I cannot install a more recent IOS. Without updating my present Firefox, would I still have access to all my favorite folders and applications? Thanks for your help. Best regards, Marcel Arnould
creator: marcel.arnould

title: Arama yaptığımda sonuçları göremiyorum.
content: Google arama motoru üzerinden arama yapıyorum fakat sonuçları göremiyorum. Edge gibi farklı tarayıcılardan denediğimde sorun yaşamadan yapabiliyorum.

title: Lighttpd DoH server on the local network works with Brave browser but Firefox 123 complains that "TRR_FAILED"
content:
If I use the Apache server with an expired SSL certificate it works.

What am I missing?
creator: kb7ski

title: Is it possible to use Mozilla Sync without the email step?
content: I have 2fa enabled on my account, is there a way to skip/disable the third step where I have to enter a code from an email? It's already redundant with 2fa. Plus, the runaround of "enter your email, enter your password, get email, enter the code, oops your password is wrong!" is irritating enough :) It just seems unnecessarily difficult.
creator: glennmorse

title: Firefox not closing properly
content: I read where others were having the same problem, getting crash reports after trying to close down firefox and takes super long wait to be able to browse when starting again. But I never did read a fix. Can anyone help?
creator: rocknrod32

title: Firefox routinely freezes and I need to restart my computer
content:
For the last 1 year, Firefox has been reliably crashing on my machine (M1, macOS Monterey, Version 12.0.1) after a undefined period of use from the time I start up my computer. Sometimes is an hour, sometimes 30 minutes, sometimes it can last the whole day. Once it happens, it will first lose internet connection, none of the sites would load, then the only thing I can try to do is to quit it. But Force quitting or pkill -f Firefox on terminal does not entirely quit it even though the window is closed, some process is still running that prevents it from really quitting. In about 50% of the time, this crash will then spread to my entire computer, and I have to press and hold the power button to restart. This cycle will repeat a few times a day. Its completely debilitating. I have tried uninstalling (including removing all library files), reinstalling newest version, upgrading my OS etc. Problem will go away for a few days and then will slowly creep back. Happy to provide any info that you need for diagnosis.

Thank you! L
creator: lenahowilson

title: help with webpage
content: Access Denied You are not authorized to view this page because your current user profile does not include this privilege.

title: Zabránit sleep přim aktivním stahování
content: Aho, dá se nějak zařídit aby systém upadl do spánku/hibernace pokud prohlížeč stahuje (např. z pomalých zdrojů). Při obnově ze spánku již nelze stahování obnovit.

title: Screenshots Cropping Poorly in ver. 123
content: Title is self explanatory. When I try to take and save a screenshot in my browser, either when right clicking and selecting Take Screenshot or using CTRL + SHIFT + S it always cuts off some of the image I'm trying to take. Any ideas on how to get this fixed?
creator: IzzieDevil

title: Number is not getting recognised
content: After switching to Firefox version 123, I encountered an error on our website: '1,000,000.00 is not a valid number.' It seems to be a form validation error, but it worked fine with previous versions of Firefox. The application is built using GWT (Google Web Toolkit). Any help would be appreciated. Thanks.
creator: bikramgt50

title: Firefox Crashes Minutes After Start Up
content:
I have been using an old version of Firefox (109.0.1). I am not typically using a newer version because of an essential - to me - add-on which hasn't been updated, and which doesn't work in more recent versions.

On macOS Sierra this old version of Firefox crashes. Troubleshooting mode (I was prompted a number of times) and restarting the browser appears to eventually resolve the crash, but finally there is an issue with the memory and the browser doesn't "work."

The reason for the crash given is " MozCrashReason: Failed to load critical module "resource://gre/modules/WebNavigation.jsm" "

title: como habilitar o Java no navegador
content:
Estou tentando acessar o portal do Poder Judiciário ( https://www.tjrs.jus.br/novo/sistema/processo-judicial-eletronico-pje/ ) e aparece na verificação de ambiente a seguinte mensagem:

" O plugin java não está instalado ou não habilitado em seu navegador de internet. Ele é necessário para utilizar o certificado digital no PJE. No navegador Firefox, verifique o plugin Java (menu complementos/plugins). A versão atualizada do Java está disponível no site http://www.java.com/pt_BR/download/. "

Já realizei a instalação em 3 computadores diferentes e não consigo acessar.

help
creator: marco.endurancce
